channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins HashiCorp Vault Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins HashiCorp Vault Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-25197|2024-08-03T04:36:06.402Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20hashicorp%20vault%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HashiCorp Vault Plugin 336.v182c0fbaaeb7 and earlier implements functionality that allows agent processes to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-25186|2024-08-03T04:36:06.418Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20hashicorp%20vault%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HashiCorp Vault Plugin 3.8.0 and earlier implements functionality that allows agent processes to retrieve any Vault secrets for use on the agent, allowing attackers able to control agent processes to obtain Vault secrets for an attacker-specified path and key.

item.title: CVE-2022-23109|2024-08-03T03:36:19.195Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20hashicorp%20vault%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HashiCorp Vault Plugin 3.7.0 and earlier does not mask Vault credentials in Pipeline build logs or in Pipeline step descriptions when Pipeline: Groovy Plugin 2.85 or later is installed.
